cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 45 mi (75 km) SE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Slowly moving west-northwest toward the central Texas coast, then forecast to turn north and northeast mid-week and track across Louisiana/Mississippi
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Port O'Connor / Matagorda Bay

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch in effect Baffin Bay to Port Aransas, TX (well west of LA coast)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Port Aransas, TX to Morgan City, LA (ends west of New Orleans)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast tonight; storm then crawls northeast along Louisiana coast and inland Mississippi through Friday
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤15-25 kt) sustained winds with occasional gusts to tropical-storm force possible late Wednesday into Thursday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal inundation 1–3 ft possible in Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas, and along tidal lakes/rivers near the port
weather_observation.rainfall: 5–10 inches with isolated totals up to 15 inches forecast; flash and urban flooding likely
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes in outer rain bands; dangerous rip currents along Gulf beaches
